content:
I'm planning to have a few team members from our sales and product teams manning the demo station. They'll be responsible for conducting the demos, answering questions, and capturing lead information. We'll also have a few tablets set up with our CRM system, so we can quickly and easily capture lead information and follow up with them after the show.

As for follow-up, we'll have a dedicated team member responsible for sending out follow-up emails and making phone calls to the leads we generate at the show. We'll also be using our marketing automation platform to send targeted email campaigns to the leads based on their interests and interactions with our product.

In addition, we're planning to have a series of follow-up meetings and demos scheduled with the most promising leads, which will be handled by our sales team. We'll also be sending out personalized emails and letters to the leads, highlighting the benefits of our product and how it can solve their specific pain points.
